Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: good
Review: Has a history of 150+ years and it is decently maintained.Great architecture. Peaceful and gives a amazing experience

Name: Jitendra K
Title: Very beautiful
Review: So much of positivity and so much of peace it was mind blowing experience. Must visit place at least once

Name: idea614354
Title: Big church
Review: Big church in this area, Christmas celebrations will do very highly. lot of people will come here in this season.

Name: Daniel T
Title: One of oldest & most recognised Church in Hyderabad
Review: Those who grew up in Hyderabad, Gunfoundry was one area very famous in 90's. This Church was a major landmark in this area. Located between All Saints High School & Rosary convent, its an iconic Church.We grew up in its vicinity. Have fond memories of the bell which rings every evening signalling the start of Mass.Nice place of worship. Sunday worship is attended by thousands. Worth a visit for a tourist.

Name: DILIP2dilip
Title: Peaceful church
Review: One of the oldest churches in india. It is a peaceful church for you Sunday mas. I have attached mass timings in a photo. It has a glorious history. A monument indicating the same is displayed at the entrance.It has a adoration chapel for offering your prayers.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Oldest Cathedral
Review: It is said to be one of the oldest churches in India. This church is soo old but well maintained though it is not a  famous  tourist destination. Amust visit to this place to know the ancient religion and cultural background.

Name: Shailendra
Title: One of the oldest church in Hyderabad
Review: Saint Joseph Cathedral is a Catholic Church located in Gunfoundry Hyderabad. It is one of the oldest and beautiful historic church in Hyderabad notable for the beautiful architecture and huge bells.Worth a visit if you are   interested in history and architecture.

Name: GreenCarpet11
Title: You got to see the Bells
Review: St. Joseph's Cathedral standing tall , aloft a high standing area.A church that stands there telling a story of the treasures it holds within.The Bell fascinates me. Can you imagine the Ave Maria being played on these bells.You got to hear it ring.Visit at around 12 in the noon and hear your heart thud with the clanging of the bells in your ears.The clock high on the Cathedral has been ticking since 1852?! It really speaks a great story from the depth of the past.The doors, the pieta, chandelier, the painting from the Nizam, the relic of the Holy Cross, The relic of St. Antony and a lot more. Feel like a prayer and a song.See it and enjoy it. Pray and Sing. You love it.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Beautiful
Review: Very beautiful Church. It is one place which provides a lot of peace. Must visit when you are in Hyderabad.

Name: Manish K
Title: Very beautiful and peaceful church
Review: St. Josephs Cathedral is located near Basheerbagh and is well worth a visit. I visited this cathedral as well as got to attend the mass (it's closed at other times). Worth seeing are the bell tower and the relief of St. Joseph holding the infant Jesus. Do not miss the lovely statues of Jesus Christ and all the apostles outside the church, they deserve a few photographs. A place which provides one peace and satisfaction.

Name: 48aravindh
Title: Beautifully crafted church...!!!
Review: It is one of the oldest churches in INDIA, the architecture of the church depicts old Roman catholic one, it is easily accessible, the church was soo old and well maintained, it is completely untouched tourist destination, less crowdy, the landscape at the background adds over extra beauty, the priests were soo professional.. overall it's a must visit attraction in Hyderabad...!!!

Name: Raoul P
Title: Very beautiful church
Review: Heard Wednesday mass at this church, beautiful and very old church. Location is not easily accessible and needs maps and/or direction to reach here.

Name: raja p
Title: excellent
Review: this is a beautiful and ancient church in hyderabad.it is 200 years old church.it has beautiful architecture.it is a roman catholic cathedral.

Name: vibha123
Title: Memorable & beautiful Cathedral
Review: I remember visiting this cathedral for my best friends wedding...and trust me its a beautiful place to be...Its calm..soothing and peace giving...you will be at peace....inner peace they call it...Must visit if you believe in visiting all places of worship..

Name: Rohitflies
Title: Grand old Church
Review: It is a century old church but it is well maintained even to date . One can't fail to admire the architecture and interiors of the church.

Name: JnKumar
Title: Serenity at its best
Review: The structure is more than a hundred years old.One gets a good view of the hussle bustle all around.they also have services in quite a few languages.

Name: Dhrubashis
Title: Oldest and beautiful church
Review: It's a beautiful church with historic memories. One of the oldest church in Hyderabad and maintained well. I went there on Xmas day last year.

Name: keralablogger
Title: Nice church with English mass every day
Review: Located this church by surfing the net for English mass in Hyderabad. This roman Catholic Church is almost two centuries old, and maintained well. I went there by taxi and the nearest landmark is the gun foundry.  Here are some clicks of mine.
